TranslationKeys.#Welcome_Text:
By continuing, you agree to the Steam Subscriber Agreement (https://store.steampowered.com/subscriber_agreement/). 
You also agree that OpenSteamClient or it's developers will not be held responsible if your Steam account is terminated for any reason.
TranslationKeys.#PickInstallDirectory_Title: Choose an install directory to install OpenSteamClient
TranslationKeys.#PickInstallDirectory_FolderPickerTitle: Select an install directory to install OpenSteamClient
TranslationKeys.#PickInstallDirectory_Text: Games and apps may be installed in this directory, but you can also add alternative directories and drives later.
TranslationKeys.#InstallError_NoSpaceError: Selected drive does not have enough space. At least 1GB is required.
